signal.pattern: TypeScript build errors require running tsc before tests
evidence: Build failed with type errors in Curator.ts
Test execution blocked by compilation errors

recommendation: Always run npm run build before npm test to catch type errors early

signal.pattern: TypeScript module imports require .js extension even for .ts files
evidence: Had to import BeadsClient from beads-client.js not beads-client.ts
ESM modules in Node require full file extensions
tsconfig.json has "module": "ESNext" which enforces ESM rules

recommendation: Always use .js extensions in import statements for TypeScript files when using ESM module resolution
This is just to trigger bullet_updates

signal.pattern: Always validate user input before processing

recommendation: Implement input validation at API boundaries to prevent malformed data from entering the system

signal.pattern: Validate all user inputs prior to processing them

recommendation: Add input validation checks before processing user-supplied data
